scripts.publish-ngx-photo-card:
npm run ngx-photo-card && cd projects
gx-photo-card && npm version patch && cd ..\.. && ng build ngx-photo-card && cd dist
gx-photo-card && npm publish && cd ..\.. && git add projects
gx-photo-card\package.json && git commit -m "new version for ngx-photo-cards" && git pull && git push origin
scripts.publish-tursoft-collapsible: npm run build-tursoft-collapsible && cd projects\tursoft-collapsible && npm version patch && cd ..\.. && ng build tursoft-collapsible && cd dist\tursoft-collapsible && npm publish && cd ..\.. && git add projects\tursoft-collapsible\package.json && git commit -m "new version for tursoft-collapsible" && git pull && git push origin
scripts.publish-ngx-text-expander:
npm run build-ngx-text-expander && cd projects
gx-text-expander && npm version patch && cd ..\.. && ng build ngx-text-expander && cd dist
gx-text-expander && npm publish && cd ..\.. && git add projects
gx-text-expander\package.json && git commit -m "new version for ngx-text-expander" && git pull && git push origin
scripts.build-all: npm run build-ngx-photo-card && npm run build-tursoft-collapsible
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-ngx-photo-card && npm run publish-tursoft-collapsible && publish-ngx-text-expander
